channel.title: 2014 on Gao's reading notes
channel.description: Recent content in 2014 on Gao's reading notes

item.title: 1. Pickrell J.
item.description: Joint Analysis of Functional Genomic Data and Genome-wide Association Studies of 18 Human Traits DOI https://dx.doi.org/10.1016%2Fj.ajhg.2014.03.004 Journal AJHG Problem Incorperating multiple types of annotations to re-discover GWAS signals. Method Related to Veyrieras et al (2008) (Stephens lab), but Formulating with Wakefields’s approximate BF calculations Adding in a shrinkage penalty to the logistic link for annotations and use a 10-fold CV for it And also additionally use some heuristic rules to select the model Posterior is given as Maller et al (2012)
